description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Cell' for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend. The component manages animated rendering of a single cell, reflecting game state such as value ('X' or 'O'), highlight status, and disabled state. It incorporates theme-based styling, accessibility features, and various animations for interaction and visual effects.

methods.name: Cell
methods.description: React functional component for rendering a single Tic Tac Toe cell with animations and accessibility features.
